operations with func collections
[function for interpolation (func)]


Functions

bool surfit::funcs_delall ()
 removes all func's from surfit_funcs
bool surfit::funcs_del (int pos)
 removes func from surfit_funcs at "pos" position
bool surfit::funcs_load (const char *filename, const char *funcname=0)
 loads func from ROFF file (see datafile for details) and adds it to surfit_funcs
bool surfit::funcs_load_grd (const char *filename, const char *funcname=NULL)
 loads func from SURFER grd file (ASCII format) and adds it to surfit_funcs
bool surfit::funcs_unload (const char *name)
 removes first func from surfit_funcs named with "name"
func * surfit::funcs_at (int pos)
 returns func at "pos" position from surfit_funcs
func * surfit::funcs_first ()
 returns first func from surfit_funcs
func * surfit::funcs_last ()
 returns last func from surfit_funcs
int surfit::funcs_size ()
 returns amount of functions in surfit_funcs
int surfit::funcs_info ()
 prints information about functions in surfit_funcs
